title: Mobile-Based Academic Information Literacy and Text Analysis Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills, workplace information retrieval experience, foundational business vocabulary and reading comprehension
context.additional_context: A program for workplace efficiency, designed for smartphone-only access (no PC required). It emphasizes text analysis, information synthesis, and professional expression skills in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three+ mobile-based strategies (keyword selection, filtering, cross-referencing) to efficiently search for work-related academic information.
Learners can identify and apply ≥5 criteria (source verification, recency, objectivity, expertise, practicality) to evaluate the reliability and appropriateness of information in practical tasks.

Learners can complete project deliverables by applying techniques such as text restructuring, key sentence extraction, and specialized terminology interpretation when utilizing acquired information in workplace report writing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
